verbs.description: With [ARG1: more leaks] [V: coming] [ARGM-DIR: out] [ARG3: of the Trump administration] , the White House is conducting sweeps to collect personal devices in order to cut down on leaks from West Wing staffers .
With more leaks coming out of the Trump administration , the White House [V: is] conducting sweeps to collect personal devices in order to cut down on leaks from West Wing staffers .
